SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation

Class ProductRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation.ProductRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductRepository
@Repository public class ProductRepositoryImpl extends Object implements ProductRepository
Implementation of ProductRepository for managing product data in Firestore, including methods to retrieve, add, update, and find product details.

      public ProductDTO findByPID(String pid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a product by its unique product ID (PID). Retrieves a product document from Firestore based on the provided PID. Converts the document into a ProductDTO if it exists.
      Specified by:
      findByPID in interface ProductRepository
      Parameters:
      pid - the unique product ID
      Returns:
      a ProductDTO containing product details, or null if not found
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findAll

      public List<Product> findAll() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves all products available in the database. Fetches all product documents from Firestore and maps each document to a Product object.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface ProductRepository
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects representing all products

    • addByPID

      public void addByPID(String PID, ProductDTO product)
      Adds a new product to the database with the specified product ID (PID). Adds a new product document to Firestore with the specified PID as the document ID.
      Specified by:
      addByPID in interface ProductRepository
      Parameters:
      PID - the unique product ID
      product - a ProductDTO containing details of the product to add

    • updateByPID

      public void updateByPID(String PID, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates an existing product based on its product ID (PID) with the provided data. Updates an existing product document in Firestore with new data based on the provided PID. Each key-value pair in the data map represents a field to be updated.
      Specified by:
      updateByPID in interface ProductRepository
      Parameters:
      PID - the unique product ID
      data - a Map containing the fields to update and their new values
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findByProductName

      public Product findByProductName(String name) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds a product by its name. Searches for a product document in Firestore based on its name. Converts the first matching document into a Product object if it exists.
      Specified by:
      findByProductName in interface ProductRepository
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product
      Returns:
      a Product object representing the product with the specified name, or null if not found
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

      public com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot getUrlByName(String productName) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the URL of a product's image based on its name. Retrieves a Firestore document snapshot containing the URL of a product's image based on its name.
      Specified by:
      getUrlByName in interface ProductRepository

      productName - the name of the product
      Returns:
      a DocumentSnapshot containing the product's image URL, or null if no match is found
